li.label: Loves Organics
li.description: {PAWN_nameDef} has a deep fondness toward all organic life, seeing them as the pinnacle of culture and existence. {PAWN_nameDef} aspires to be as organic as possible, whatever that means to them.

li.label: Respects Organics
li.description: {PAWN_nameDef} naturally respects and is willing to trust organic life, understanding and supporting their nature.

li.label: Disrespects Organics
li.description: {PAWN_nameDef} does not understand why anyone would want to be organically based, and tries to avoid dealing with them where possible.

li.label: Hates Organics
li.description: {PAWN_nameDef} despises organic life, and is barely willing to tolerate its presence. Barely.
